package.name: rosserial_xbee
package.description:
Allows multipoint communication between rosserial nodes connected to an xbee. All nodes communicate back to a master xbee connected to a computer running ROS.
This software currently only works with Series 1 Xbees.
This pkg includes python code from the python-xbee project: http://code.google.com/p/python-xbee/
package.author: Adam Stambler
